body.p: The Guest Additions for Linux are a set of device drivers and system applications that may be installed in the guest operating system. The Linux Guest Additions will run on VMs running these versions of Linux. See also .

li.p: Oracle Linux 8 and later, including UEK kernels
Oracle Linux 5 and later, including UEK kernels
Red Hat Enterprise Linux version 3 and later
SUSE and openSUSE Linux version 9 and later

body.p: The guest additions may also work on other distributions.
